t: Victoria’s Secret Is Embracing Amazon. Should Others? | BoF
s: July 2, 2024 - It’s generally the case that brands partner with Amazon — and accept all the baggage that comes with that — because they have to. Victoria’s Secret is no exception. The lingerie giant announced this week that it would begin selling its bras, underwear and swimwear on the e-commerce platform. Not coincidentally, Victoria’s Secret last week reported that sales fell 5 percent in the first quarter from a year ago, its fifth straight quarter of decline...
